name: Special Can Tho City, Ninh Kieu Quay at night with Oscar
description: A taste of Can Tho city - Ninh Kieu Quay at night, organised by a truly local person. Try local food, local places with me - Oscar Nguyen! The information below is for a walking tour from 18:00 to 21:00 around Ninh Kieu Quay.
